title: Please help identify this font
content:
I need some help identifying this font. I have tried identifont and What the Font, but nothing came close. If anyone can help identify it or suggest fonts that are similar, that would be great. Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-06-11 at 11.15.06 AM copy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018083246/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-06-11%20at%2011.15.06%20AM%20copy_1.jpg) | 81.57 KB |
author: typecontrast

comments.content: Seems to be [Alpha Headline](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018083246/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Custom+Typefaces/Alpha+Headline/), available by request from Lineto.
Thanks for your quick reply. However, the letter O and 3 doesn't seems to match. Would it be possible that it's a custom mod to the font?

|3|, |O| and the |S| match Lineto’s (Cornel Windlin’s) [Lutz Headline](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018083246/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Headline+Fonts/Lutz+Headline/Character+Map/). May be a custom mix of the two. Definitely looks Lineto (Cornel Windlin) to me.
